34 #include "ctimer.h"
35 
43 static void ctimer_timeout_handler(ptimer_t* ptimer)
44 {
45  ctimer_t *ctimer = (ctimer_t*)ptimer;
46 
47  if( ctimer->callback )
48  {
49  PROCESS_CONTEXT_BEGIN(ctimer->context);
50  ctimer->callback(ctimer->data);
51  PROCESS_CONTEXT_END();
52  }
53 }
54 
55 
56 
57 void ctimer_start(ctimer_t *ctimer, timespan_t span, ctimer_callback_t callback, void *data)
58 {
59  ctimer->callback = callback;
60  ctimer->data = data;
61  ctimer->context = PROCESS_THIS();
62  ptimer_start(&(ctimer->ptimer), span, ctimer_timeout_handler);
63 }
